AzureBlade: Ah! That is the problem! I thought it was a predesigned 
protoform that would not have allowed me to change the beast mode! It 
can be a problem... It just depend how deep it is. But, since you are 
a dolphin, you could easily help me. What I fear is that once I am 
made physical again, I would drown in the sea before I actually get 
out.

> Alpha::
>

> spark... but this pod is in the botton sea..."
